result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
result.translation: (51) And if you could see[1238] when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby.
result.footnotes: [1238]- i.e., have a glimpse of the Hereafter.
